name: koco-payroll-system
description: Full-stack payroll management system with Node.js, React, and Supabase

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/build

author: KOCO Team
